initiator.description: Every journey begins with a step. Your curiosity about the impact of food on the environment is a great starting point. Keep exploring and learning!

starter.description: You're just getting started on your journey to understanding the impact of food on the environment. Keep learning and exploring!

aware.description: Great job! You've shown good knowledge. Keep exploring the link between food and the environment to further improve.

expert.description: Well done! You've demonstrated in-depth knowledge on the topic. Keep it up, and you'll become a true master of sustainable food!

master.description: Extraordinary! You've achieved the highest score and proven yourself a true master of food and the environment. Continue spreading awareness and commitment for a more sustainable future.
